page.title: 11My day in Ribchester
page.content: I wake up and I get dressed. I have my breakfast, I clean my teeth, then my mummy does my hair. Then Mrs Boswell comes to pick me up for ballet, we go in the car to ballet. We get dressed. Afterwards my mum picks me up from ballet, we go in the car. Lisa goes to piano, we go home for lunch. Then we ring Lisa up to see if she is playing. She can come to play, we play a game. It is time for Lisa to go. Then we have tea then me and Ruth play fairies. We have a bath, then we get out of the bath and we get ready for bed. Then we have a drink and a biscuit and go to bed.
